FIELD.NAME: questionid
FIELD.COMMENT: Foreign key linking to the question table.

FIELD.NAME: responseformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The type of input area students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: responserequired
FIELD.COMMENT: Nonzero if an inline text response is optional

FIELD.NAME: responsefieldlines
FIELD.COMMENT: Approximate height, in lines, of the input box the students should be given for their response.

FIELD.NAME: minwordlimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Minimum number of words

FIELD.NAME: maxwordlimit
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum number of words

FIELD.NAME: attachments
FIELD.COMMENT: Whether, and how many, attachments a student is allowed to include with their response. -1 means unlimited.

FIELD.NAME: attachmentsrequired
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of attachments that should be required

FIELD.NAME: graderinfo
FIELD.COMMENT: Information shown to people with permission to manually grade the question, when they are grading.

FIELD.NAME: graderinfoformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The text format for graderinfo.

FIELD.NAME: responsetemplate
FIELD.COMMENT: The template to pre-populate student's response field during attempt.

FIELD.NAME: responsetemplateformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The text format for responsetemplate.

FIELD.NAME: responsesample
FIELD.COMMENT: The sample to pre-populate student's response field during attempt.

FIELD.NAME: responsesampleformat
FIELD.COMMENT: The text format for responsesample.

FIELD.NAME: allowsimilarity
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum allowable level of similarity between a response and the response template or response sample

FIELD.NAME: maxbytes
FIELD.COMMENT: Maximum size of attached files in bytes.

FIELD.NAME: filetypeslist
FIELD.COMMENT: file types that may be submitted with response

FIELD.NAME: enableautograde
FIELD.COMMENT: Nonzero if auto-grading is enabled

FIELD.NAME: itemtype
FIELD.COMMENT: Numeric code to represent the type of countable items to look for in the essay text

FIELD.NAME: itemcount
FIELD.COMMENT: The number of countable items expected to be present in the essay text.

FIELD.NAME: showfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the actionable feedback be shown on the grading and review pages?

FIELD.NAME: showcalculation
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the grade calculation be shown on the grading and review pages?

FIELD.NAME: showtextstats
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the text statistics be shown on the grading and review pages?

FIELD.NAME: textstatitems
FIELD.COMMENT: A comma separted list of auto-feedback items to be displayed

FIELD.NAME: showgradebands
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the grade bands be shown on the grading and review pages?

FIELD.NAME: addpartialgrades
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the target phrases be shown on the grading and review pages?

FIELD.NAME: showtargetphrases
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the target phrases be shown on the grading and review pages?

FIELD.NAME: errorcmid
FIELD.COMMENT: Course module ID of a Glossary or Database containing a list of common errors

FIELD.NAME: errorpercent
FIELD.COMMENT: The penalty to be deducted for each error that is found in the response

FIELD.NAME: errorfullmatch
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the common errors be matched only as whole words?

FIELD.NAME: errorcasesensitive
FIELD.COMMENT: Should the common errors be matched sensitive to upper and lower case?

FIELD.NAME: errorignorebreaks
FIELD.COMMENT: Should line breaks and white space be ignored when matching the common errors?

FIELD.NAME: correctfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any correct response.

FIELD.NAME: incorrectfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any incorrect response.

FIELD.NAME: partiallycorrectfeedback
FIELD.COMMENT: Feedback shown for any partially correct response.
